topic.title: Quality gate
topic.p: Quality gate is the number of codebase problems that serves as a threshold. One the threshold amount of problems is detected, %product% terminates the build in a CI/CD pipeline.
This section covers the following cases of setting the quality gate feature:

list.li: Local run using the CLI command

chapter.title: Local run
chapter.p: Although local %product% run implies it being outside a CI/CD pipeline, this example better demonstrates how to configure the quality gate feature.
